abstract: Japan and China discuss creation of hotline to ease tensions in East China Sea during their first high-level security talks in four years.
lead_paragraph: The two nations, holding their first meeting on security issues in four years, discussed the creation of a hotline to ease tensions in the East China Sea.

headline.main: Japan and China Inch Toward Mending Ties
headline.print_headline: Japan and China Inch Toward Mending Ties

snippet: The two nations, holding their first meeting on security issues in four years, discussed the creation of a hotline to ease tensions in the East China Sea.
